newsitem.title: USA: PNC Bank Corp unit ups prime to 8.50 pct.
newsitem.headline: PNC Bank Corp unit ups prime to 8.50 pct.

text.p: PNC Bank N.A., a unit of PNC Bank Corp, raised its prime lending rate to 8.50 percent from 8.25 percent effective immediately, the bank said on Wednesday.
The move follows a decision by the Federal Reserve on Tuesday to raise the federal funds rate by 25 basis points to 5.50 percent and to leave the discount rate unchanged.
Before Tuesday's move, the Fed had last altered monetary policy on January 31, 1996, when it lowered both the federal funds rate and the discount rate by 25 basis points.
